target: We have several. What part of town are you thinking?
context: <user> I will be staying in Cambridge. I need a hotel with wifi. <system> What about a and b guest house? It's in the East. <user> I need something in the centre. <system> There are 7 hotels which area do you prefer? <user> The north part of town <system> I ran a search in the north, there's 12 choices. Lets make sure were on the same page, is this the area that you want? Also hotel or Guesthouse? <user> Sorry, I've been all over the place. To be clear, I need a hotel with free wifi and parking that is in the centre. <system> Shall I choose a hotel for you, or do you have a preference? 4 hotels have free parking and internet in that area.<user> yes please recommend one. the booking is needed for saturday. 3 nights, 6 people <system> May I recommend alexander bed and breakfast. While it is a cheap guesthouse in the centre of town, it has a 4 star rating and also included internet and parking<user> Ok great. Can you book a room for 6 people and 3 nights starting from Saturday. <system> Booking was successful. Reference number is : QK6KCZQA<user> Great, thank you. Im also in need of an Indian restaurant in the cheap price range. Can you find me one? <system>
